H3.text: when was the last time dallas cowboys won the super bowl. 1995

A4.text: The Cowboys won Super Bowl XXX in January 1996.

A5.text: The Cowboys won Super Bowl XII in 1977.

A6.text: The Cowboys defeated the Steelers by the score of 27â€“17, winning their fifth Super Bowl in team history.

A7.text: The Cowboys have not reached the NFC Championship Game since winning Super Bowl XXX, the fourth longest active Conference Championship appearance drought in the NFL (not including the Houston Texans who have never appeared in a Conference Championship Game but have only been a franchise since 2002).

A8.text: The 1995 Dallas Cowboys season was the franchise's 36th season in the National Football League (NFL) and was the second year under head coach Barry Switzer and final of the three Super Bowl titles they would win during 1992 to 1995.

A9.text: As of 2024, this is the most recent time the Cowboys appeared in the NFC Championship Game, the longest such drought in the NFC and making them the only team not to make it in the 21st century. Therefore, it is also their most recent Super Bowl appearance.
